front.title: Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP)-approved security functions

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The approved security functions listed in this publication replace the ones listed in International Organization for Standardization/International Electrotechnical Commission (ISO/IEC) 19790 Annex C and ISO/IEC 24759 6.15, within the context of the Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP). As a validation authority, the CMVP may supersede Annex C in its entirety.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
